items.Name: Valkyrie's Prosthesis
items.Lore:
Golden prosthesis once used by the one-armed valkyrie. 
 A masterwork of craftsmanship, with practice and skill it can be used as proficiently as a real arm.

items.Name: Academy Scroll
items.Lore: Scroll of the Academy of Raya Lucaria, the glintstone sorcerers' place of study.

items.Name: Ritual Pot
items.Lore: This empty pot somehow mends itself when broken. Special item with greater durability than a cracked pot.

items.Name: Volcano Manor Invitation
items.Lore:
Letter given by Rya as thanks for retrieving her necklace. 
 
 Contains an invitation to Volcano Manor. 
 
"Brave Tarnished,
 Seek the Altus Plateau in the realm of the Erdtree. 
 
 Prove yourself by making this journey, and the Volcano Manor will fully extend its invitation. To fight, amongst a family of champions. "

items.Name: Godskin Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook bound in supple skin. 
Incantations of the god-slaying black flame are written within.

items.Name: Giant's Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook that contains the secrets of the Fire Giants. Kept hidden by the prelates who monitor the Giant's Flame. 
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:
- Giantsflame Take Thee
- Flame, Fall Upon Them

items.Name: Tonic of Forgetfulness
items.Lore: Tonic in a small brass vial.

items.Name: Map (Mt. Gelmir)
items.Lore:
Map of Mt. Gelmir and environs. 
 
 Mt. Gelmir, which houses the Volcano Manor at its summit, is characterized by sheer cliffs and ominous skies. 
These qualities only became more pronounced after the Shattering.

items.Name: Irina's Letter
items.Lore:
Letter given by Irina, addressed to her father, the commander of Castle Morne. 
 
 Gorgeous silken handkerchief, lightly stained with blood. Words can be made out within.

items.Name: Unalloyed Gold Needle
items.Lore: An intricately crafted needle of unalloyed gold. Once snapped in half, it has been repaired by Sage Gowry.

items.Name: Dragon Cult Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook of the capital's ancient dragon cult. 
A text of the knights' faith that arose after the War of the Ancient Dragons.

items.Name: The Stormhawk King
items.Lore: Ashes of a hawk revered by all others as sovereign back in the days when Stormveil's winds still raged like no other.

items.Name: Map (Caelid)
items.Lore: Map of Caelid and environs.

items.Name: Map (Liurnia, North)
items.Lore:
Map of Liurnia's northern region. 
The Academy of Raya Lucaria towers over the north, while at its base spreads the town built around it, now flooded. Two highroads end their journeys here.

items.Name: Serpent's Amnion
items.Lore: Amnion from the mother's womb which cradled the poor unwanted offspring of a repellant birthing ritual.

items.Name: Rusty Key
items.Lore: Rusted iron key.

items.Name: Map (Liurnia, West)
items.Lore: Map of Liurnia's western region.

items.Name: Amber Draught
items.Lore: Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis containing a gleaming amber draught for use in a scheme.

items.Name: Whetstone Knife
items.Lore: Whetstone with a cipher inscription, made to look like a small knifeblade.

items.Name: Fingerslayer Blade
items.Lore: The hidden treasure of the Eternal City of Nokron; a blade said to have been born of a corpse.

items.Name: Fingerprint Grape
items.Lore:
Eyeball of the knight Vyke, inflamed yellow. 
 Seared with a repulsive fingerprint burn akin to those that marred his entire body.

items.Name: Miniature Ranni
items.Lore:
A doll resembling Ranni the Witch. 
From head to toe every detail is perfect.

items.Name: Map (Consecrated Snowfield)
items.Lore:
Map of Consecrated Snowfield and environs. 

The route through this land, crossed east to west by a frozen river, leads to Miquella's Haligtree. This is the path taken by those unchosen, though it is a trial all the same.

items.Name: Two Fingers Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook containing incantations of the Two Fingers. 
An item once entrusted to Tarnished worthy of lordship.

items.Name: Seluvis's Potion
items.Lore: Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis containing a cloudy tonic of bluish black.

items.Name: Map (Limgrave, East)
items.Lore:
Map of the eastern region of Limgrave. 
Other than the Mistwood which envelops the south, it is known for its lands which lead to Caelid, a path trod by many a soldier in the past.

items.Name: Lost Ashes of War
items.Lore: Empty ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle.

items.Name: Academy Glintstone Key
items.Lore: Key to the seals binding both gates to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

items.Name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)
items.Lore: Left half of a split medallion depicting the Haligtree.

items.Name: Amber Starlight
items.Lore:
An ephemeral sliver that gives off a pale amber glow. 
What remains of a passing flash of starlight.

items.Name: Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook of the capital's ancient dragon cult. A lost tome that never reached the Lands Between. 
Contains red lightning incantations.

items.Name: Asimi, Silver Tear
items.Lore:
An asimi that has infected a tarnished. 
 
 An intelligent silver sludge; asimi�infect the body of tarnished,�granting the host power.

items.Name: Royal House Scroll
items.Lore:
Sorcery scroll of the Carian royal family, the heads of the
 Academy of Raya Lucaria.

items.Name: Alexander�s Innards
items.Lore: A keepsake of the warrior jar Alexander. Found at the core of the dead flesh that once filled the great jar.

items.Name: Crafting Kit
items.Lore: Leather bag containing a pestle and mortar, small blade, and various other tools.

items.Name: Rya's Necklace
items.Lore:
Necklace stolen from Rya by the blackguard. 
 Features a relief of a dignified looking woman from a foreign country. 
 
 It appears to hold great significance for Rya.

items.Name: Map (Limgrave, West)
items.Lore:
Map of the western region of Limgrave. 
 
 The demesne of Limgrave, far south of the Erdtree, is bordered to the northwest by the cliffs of Stormveil, and under its ever-clouded skies roll the great steppes of the pale lands.

items.Name: Carian Inverted Statue
items.Lore: Statuette of a scholar, with ground and sky inverted.

items.Name: Black Knifeprint
items.Lore: On the Night of the Black Knives, someone stole a fragment of Death from Maliketh, the Black Blade, and imbued its power into the assassins' daggers.

items.Name: Map (Mohgwyn Palace)
items.Lore: Map of Mohgwyn Palace and environs.

items.Name: Gold Sewing Needle
items.Lore:
Sewing needle made of gold. 
 Unique item made to alter demigod attire. 
 
 One of the tools brought by Radagon when he entered into marriage with Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon, and joined the Carian line.

items.Name: Map (Mountaintops of The Giants, East)
items.Lore:
Map of Eastern Mountaintops of the Giants. 
The remote, desolate eastern summit is the highest point in all the Lands Between, overlooking even the Flame Peak to the south.

items.Name: Rold Medallion
items.Lore: Conjoined split medallion depicting the Flame Peak.

items.Name: Stonesword Key
items.Lore: A sword-shaped stone key.

items.Name: Fire Monks' Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook of the Fire Monks, who came from the Mountaintops of the Giants far to the north. 
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:

items.Name: Asimi's Husk
items.Lore: The shedding of an Asimi that infected a tarnished.

items.Name: Weathered Dagger
items.Lore: Dagger received from Fia, the Deathbed Companion.

items.Name: Deathroot
items.Lore: A source that gives rise to Those Who Live in Death.

items.Name: Imbued Sword Key
items.Lore:
Stone key shaped like a sword. 
A special item, imbued with rich blue magic.

items.Name: Dancer's Castanets
items.Lore: Castanets used by dancers from foreign lands. Received from Patches.

items.Name: Discarded Palace Key
items.Lore: A key discarded by Lunar Princess Ranni alongside her very flesh.

items.Name: Iji's Confession
items.Lore: A letter of confession found on Iji's corpse.

items.Name: Dragon Heart
items.Lore:
Dragon heart seized by a dragon tracker. 
 Riddled with Gravel Stone, this grotesque organ continues to beat vivaciously.

items.Name: Golden Order Principia
items.Lore: Prayerbook of the Golden Order fundamentalists. A dense and complex academic treatise that contains the Order's fundamental principles.

items.Name: Lord of Blood's Favor
items.Lore:
Pure white oath-cloth given by Varr�. The final trial to be anointed a Knight of Mohg, Lord of Blood. 
 
"Soak the cloth with a maiden's blood. . . The blood of anyone's maiden will do. You are maidenless, after all. "

items.Name: Map (Altus Plateau)
items.Lore:
Map of Altus Plateau and environs. 
The Altus Plateau, where the Erdtree's base can be found, contains the Royal Capital of Leyndell to the east, and Mt. Gelmir to the west. Scars from the Shattering remain apparent to this day.

items.Name: Celestial Dew
items.Lore:
A hidden Tear found in the Eternal City. 
 Also known as a Night Tear.

items.Name: Perfume Bottle
items.Lore: Glass bottles used by perfumers. Used to seal various scent compounds.

items.Name:
Map 
(Dragonbarrow)
items.Lore: Map of Dragonbarrow and environs.

items.Name: Drawing-Room Key
items.Lore: Key to Volcano Manor's drawing room.

items.Name: Beast Eye
items.Lore: Claw-marked stone eye received from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman.

items.Name: Larval Tear
items.Lore:
Core of a creature of mimicry known as a silver tear. 
As much as a substance as it is a living organism.

items.Name: Map (Lake of Rot)
items.Lore:
Map of Lake of Rot and environs. 
A great lake of standing water downstream of the Ainsel River. It is said that the divine essence of an outer god is sealed away in this land.

items.Name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)
items.Lore: Right�half of a split medallion depicting the Haligtree.

items.Name: Dectus Medallion (Right)
items.Lore: Right half of a split medallion depicting the Erdtree.

items.Name: Spirit Calling Bell
items.Lore: A bell capable of summoning various spirits from ashen remains. It usually requires FP to use.

items.Name: Sewer-Gaol Key
items.Lore: Filthy key received from the Dung Eater.

items.Name: Seluvis's Introduction
items.Lore:
Scroll bearing a royal coat of arms. 
A letter of introduction written by Preceptor Seluvis.

items.Name: Tailoring Tools
items.Lore: A portable set of tailoring tools.

items.Name: Talisman Pouch
items.Lore: Small, withered bag, knitted by hand. Bestowed upon the ruling lord, or those attempting to become lord, by the elderly Finger Reader.

items.Name: Dark Moon Ring
items.Lore: Ring depicting a leaden full moon. Symbolic of a cold oath, the ring is supposed to be given by Lunar Princess Ranni to her consort.

items.Name: Cracked Pot
items.Lore: This empty pot somehow mends itself when broken.

items.Name: Chrysalids' Memento
items.Lore: Memento left by the chrysalids sacrificed for grafting. A brooch wrapped in red velvet. Traces of blood are visible.

items.Name: Memory Stone
items.Lore:
A black, lightly beguiling stone. 
 Prized by the sorcerers who produce them.

items.Name: Map (Deeproot Depths)
items.Lore:
Map of Deeproot Depths and environs. 
 
At the very depths of the Erdtree's majestic roots lies the source of the Ainsel and the Siofra rivers. Here too begins the network of Greattree roots that spread throughout the Lands Between.

items.Name: Mirage Riddle
items.Lore:
Simple map taken from an imp statue. 
 
 A riddle concerning a rise that vanishes like a mirage.

items.Name: Sellian Sealbreaker
items.Lore: Glintstone key received from the sorceress Sellen.

items.Name: Shabriri Grape
items.Lore: A yellowing, oozing eyeball of the infirm. The surface is shriveled, and the inside is squishy, not unlike a large, overly-ripe grape.

items.Name: Map (Mountaintops of The Giants, West)
items.Lore:
Map of Western Mountaintops of the Giants. 
Marching ground during the War against the Giants. They carved winding paths in the cliff walls right up to the summit, leading to the untrodden snow-laden region beyond.

items.Name: Map (Ainsel River)
items.Lore: Map of Ainsel River and environs

items.Name: Meeting Place Map
items.Lore:
Simple map found on a corpse. 
Seems to point to a meeting place. 
The man it came from surely desired one. The sole means of gaining entry into the academy: a glintstone key.

items.Name: Map (Leyndell, Royal Capital)
items.Lore: Map of the Royal Capital of Leyndell and environs.

items.Name: Letter to Bernahl
items.Lore:
A written request from Volcano Manor addressed to Bernahl disclosing the names of two Tarnished to be hunted. 
"Vargram the Raging Wolf"
"Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm"
Both men can be found in the Royal Capital of Leyndell. Find the red mark on your map for the exact location.

items.Name: Burial Crow's Letter
items.Lore: A letter affixed to a graveyard crow's leg. Sought after by Kal�.

items.Name: Cursemark of Death
items.Lore: Cursemark carved into the discarded flesh of Ranni the Witch. Also known as the half-wheel wound of the centipede.

items.Name: Golden Tailoring Tools
items.Lore:
Tailoring tools made from gold. 
 Tools brought with the red-haired Radagon when he married into the Carian line.

items.Name: Map (Siofra River)
items.Lore: Map of Siofra River and environs

items.Name: Seedbed Curse
items.Lore: Curse grown on a corpse killed and defiled by the Dung Eater. A tender pox afflicted with omen horns.

items.Name: Dectus Medallion (Left)
items.Lore: Left half of a split medallion depicting the Erdtree.

items.Name: Map (Weeping Peninsula)
items.Lore:
Map of the Weeping Peninsula. 
The peninsula, to Limgrave's south, is named for its unceasing rainfall, redolent of lament.

items.Name: Map (Liurnia, East)
items.Lore:
Map of Liurnia's eastern region. 
The majority of Liurnia, known for its vast forests and ever-present fog, is sinking into a lake. The eastern coast is home to a highroad running north and south.

items.Name: Sewing Needle
items.Lore:
A large sewing needle, curved like a fang. 
Boc the demi-human's prized possession.

items.Name: Lucent Baldachin's Blessing
items.Lore:
Sacred seal of a hidden shrine that looks much�like a bedchamber. A faint light leaks through�a crack in its fastened doors, as if the Firefly is�beckoning to come inside. 
 
 Raise in prayer to gain protection. 
 
 Gaining protection consumes this item,�but can grant unique effects. 
 Take care though, these effects cannot be undone.

items.Name: Sellen's Primal Glintstone
items.Lore:
Glintstone from within the sorceress Sellen's body. 
Seemingly half-alive, blood vessels are visible within. 

In essence, a primal glintstone is a sorcerer's soul. 
If transplanted into a compatible new body after their original body dies, the sorcerer will rise again. 

"My apprentice, do you think it distasteful?"

items.Name: Assassin's Prayerbook
items.Lore:
Prayerbook of the Roundtable Hold's assassins. 
Can be given to a learned cleric to gain access to the following incantations:

items.Name: Conspectus Scroll
items.Lore:
A sorcery scroll from the Academy of Raya Lucaria. 
 Details superior sorceries taught to scholars worthy of donning the stone crown and studying a certain conspectus. 
 
 Can be given to a learned sorcerer to gain access to the following sorceries:
 
 - Glintstone Cometshard
 - Star Shower
